Title: Two Piece Short Sleeve Evening Dress

----

Sku: CR756

Colors: black

Category: evening

Featured-image: CR756-black-two-piece-short-sleeve-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A fun and chic two piece gown with jersey knit bodice that is appliqued with corded trim around the waistline and neckline. The sleeves feature a sparkling fringe. The back of the bodice is open with an upside-down V-shape. The floor length skirt is trimmed with the same corded applique.
